alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lonoke; Prairie; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 12:23AM CST until January 12 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Woodruff County in eastern Arkansas... North central Prairie County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Jackson County in eastern Arkansas... North central Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Southeastern White County in central Arkansas... * Until 115 AM CST. * At 1223 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Searcy, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Searcy... Augusta... Beebe... Ward... Bald Knob... Judsonia... Kensett... Higginson... Patterson... Russell... West Point... Tupelo... McCrory... Crosby... McFadden... Hurricane Lake WMA... Pryor... McRae... Garner... Griffithville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
